TopicTitle: [Elcano Challenge] Voyage of the Silverfish: Silverfish IV

Articles.Content:
New update, new craft! The challenge begins again. The brand new CRN-10 *Silverfish* has begun it's journey around the poles of Kerbin in a mostly land-based journey.

The Elcano Challenge is a circumnavigation of Kerbin by land and sea. Though it is a long challenge, it is by no means boring. There are some incredible sights to see, and your craft must be able to take quite a beating as it travels around the globe. The progress begins below!

You're so lucky to actually have trees. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

The *Silverfish* is now much farther than the *Dawn Racer* ever got. The key is to survive, because at this range, new rover shipments will be difficult.

Nice try, you bugger of a hill.

![ROG357p.png](http://i.imgur.com/ROG357p.png)

I started the original mission in Version 0.90.0, August 20th.

This was the craft I began with.

![b3nL2cH.png](http://i.imgur.com/b3nL2cH.png)

Ugly and flimsy, but I loved the old thing. Then 1.0 hit...

![wsTRa3A.png](http://i.imgur.com/wsTRa3A.png)

CRN-05. It could fly, swim, and boy could it run. Unfortunately, it had a fatal flaw...

![y8rno5Y.png](http://i.imgur.com/y8rno5Y.png)

Ran out of fuel. And so the *Dawn Racer* was born.

![HzsAZqH.png](http://i.imgur.com/HzsAZqH.png)

This sucker was FAST. 

![hdWjgDy.png](http://i.imgur.com/hdWjgDy.png)

And I tried. I honestly did. But it always ended with the craft glitching through the terrain and exploding.

![32cQTse.png](http://i.imgur.com/32cQTse.png)

We had our fun moments, though.

![lAsdpRQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/lAsdpRQ.png)

And so there was a hiatus.

Then there was 1.0.4. A fresh start.

![UmhzPmG.png](http://i.imgur.com/UmhzPmG.png)

*Silverfish* was built and launched and is still going strong. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Across the ice. This is a place I've never seen before.

![RKPBCKh.png](http://i.imgur.com/RKPBCKh.png)

Well, the second Silverfish crashed a while back. Jeb survived, thankfully.  

See, the challenge lets you replace your rover if and when you crash. Now, the problem is.... the rover is WAY over here:  

[spoiler=The Crash Site][img]http://i.imgur.com/j0Hygez.png[/img]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/uPohqLU.png[/img][/spoiler]  

A couple of attempts to send in a new rover failed.  

[spoiler=Well, this sucks...][img]http://i.imgur.com/HA3HZwL.png[/img][/spoiler]  

And then I manged it.  

[spoiler=The Successful Attempt][img]http://i.imgur.com/iHdN1Ea.png[/img]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZoQgjMV.png[/img]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/I8vbbCj.png[/img]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zjbETtz.png[/img][/spoiler]  

But I forgot a few things. The ladder was in the wrong place, for example. The headlight was misplaced. And the medium gear? Bad option. :(  

So, once again, I send another rover. More like the original one again, except with a few fuel tanks swapped out for structural tanks to add buoyancy.  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/aNm5XZg.png[/img]  

And so the challenge continues.

[spoiler=Silverfish has Landed.]  

[I]Silverfish IV[/I] approaches [I]III[/I], which was ill-equipped for travelling.  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/VNTMcOw.png[/img]  

Successfully touching down, the carrier kneels to release the rover.  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/QDDF72y.png[/img]  

Pop go the big wings.  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fBmzcZo.png[/img]  

Inbound on [I]Silverfish III.[/I]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/i97oPPq.png[/img]  

[/spoiler]  

[spoiler=Crew swap]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/7VFczE1.png[/img]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/RrucKwE.png[/img]  

[/spoiler]  

[spoiler=Running Shots]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/NZABtKu.png[/img]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/hQ7t43D.png[/img]  

[/spoiler]  

This time... It will be finished. Four's my lucky number...  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Qpme0vs.png[/img]
